title: Crystal Scar
body: Will crystal scar ever be an official pvp game mode in oce?

replies.body:
I doubt it. 
Not enough people would play it so the q times would be too long.
Oddly enough, Russia has all queues but less people on their server...

I used to play this mode a fair bit, I can't remember if it was ever on OCE or not, but it was a fun game mode. Something different than just ARAM, Conquest and TT, which are all basically the same thing.

Rito needs to give OCE some more map modes on a permanent basis, not only will this hopefully get more players to play, but I know I will play more due to the choices that are there.

For us in OCE all we can do during the week is Conquest or ARAM, and only one of those gives you something other than a laugh, eventually everyone gets bored when it is just the same thing every time you play, we need a variety or players will start walking.
